slither_findings.description:
Government (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#3-116) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- creditorAddresses.push(msg.sender) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#49)
slither_findings.markdown:
[Government](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L3-L116) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- [creditorAddresses.push(msg.sender)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L49)

slither_findings.description:
Government (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#3-116) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- creditorAmounts.push(amount * 110 / 100) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#50)
slither_findings.markdown:
[Government](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L3-L116) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- [creditorAmounts.push(amount * 110 / 100)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L50)

slither_findings.description: Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(amount) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#73)
Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77) ignores return value by buddy.send(amount * 5 / 100) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#61)
Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(amount) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#30)

Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77) ignores return value by corruptElite.send(amount * 5 / 100) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#53)
Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77) ignores return value by corruptElite.send(this.balance) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#33)

Government.inheritToNextGeneration(address).nextGeneration (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#102) lacks a zero-check on :
		- corruptElite = nextGeneration (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#104)

Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lastTimeOfNewCredit + TWELVE_HOURS < block.timestamp (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#28)
slither_findings.markdown:
[Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L24-L77) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [lastTimeOfNewCredit + TWELVE_HOURS < block.timestamp](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L28)

slither_findings.description: solc-0.4.24 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
slither_findings.markdown: solc-0.4.24 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.

slither_findings.description:
Reentrancy in Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77):
	External calls:
	- corruptElite.send(amount * 5 / 100) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#53)
	- buddy.send(amount * 5 / 100) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#61)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- buddies[msg.sender] += amount * 110 / 100 (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#63)
slither_findings.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L24-L77):
	External calls:
	- [corruptElite.send(amount * 5 / 100)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L53)
	- [buddy.send(amount * 5 / 100)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L61)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [buddies[msg.sender] += amount * 110 / 100](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L63)

slither_findings.description:
Reentrancy in Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77):
	External calls:
	- corruptElite.send(amount * 5 / 100) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#53)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- profitFromCrash += amount * 5 / 100 (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#56)

Reentrancy in [Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L24-L77):

slither_findings.description:
Reentrancy in Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(amount) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#30)
	- creditorAddresses[creditorAddresses.length - 1].send(profitFromCrash) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#32)
	- corruptElite.send(this.balance) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#33)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- creditorAddresses = new address[](0) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#38)
	- creditorAmounts = new uint256[](0) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#39)
	- lastCreditorPayedOut = 0 (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#35)
	- lastTimeOfNewCredit = block.timestamp (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#36)
	- profitFromCrash = 0 (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#37)
	- round += 1 (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#40)
slither_findings.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L24-L77):
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.send(amount)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L30)
	- [creditorAddresses[creditorAddresses.length - 1].send(profitFromCrash)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L32)
	- [corruptElite.send(this.balance)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L33)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [creditorAddresses = new address[](0)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L38)
	- [creditorAmounts = new uint256[](0)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L39)
	- [lastCreditorPayedOut = 0](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L35)
	- [lastTimeOfNewCredit = block.timestamp](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L36)
	- [profitFromCrash = 0](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L37)
	- [round += 1](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L40)

slither_findings.description:
Reentrancy in Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#24-77):
	External calls:
	- corruptElite.send(amount * 5 / 100) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#53)
	- buddy.send(amount * 5 / 100) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#61)
	- creditorAddresses[lastCreditorPayedOut].send(creditorAmounts[lastCreditorPayedOut]) (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#66)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- buddies[creditorAddresses[lastCreditorPayedOut]] -= creditorAmounts[lastCreditorPayedOut] (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#67)
	- lastCreditorPayedOut += 1 (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#68)
slither_findings.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L24-L77):
	External calls:
	- [corruptElite.send(amount * 5 / 100)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L53)
	- [buddy.send(amount * 5 / 100)](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L61)
	- [creditorAddresses[lastCreditorPayedOut].send(creditorAmounts[lastCreditorPayedOut])](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L66)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [buddies[creditorAddresses[lastCreditorPayedOut]] -= creditorAmounts[lastCreditorPayedOut]](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L67)
	- [lastCreditorPayedOut += 1](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L68)

slither_findings.description: Loop condition i < creditorAmounts.length (Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#85) should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.
slither_findings.markdown: Loop condition [i < creditorAmounts.length](Preprocessed_Contracts/ponzigovernmental.sol#L85) should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.
